# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/react-beautiful-dnd`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for react-beautiful-dnd (https://github.com/atlassian/react-beautiful-dnd).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/react-beautiful-dnd/v12.

### Additional Details
 * Last updated: Thu, 28 May 2020 00:55:24 GMT
 * Dependencies: [@types/react](https://npmjs.com/package/@types/react)
 * Global values: none
